member.name: T:Spire.DocViewer.License.LicenseProvider
member.summary: Class Spire.DocViewer.LicenseProvider.

member.name: M:Spire.DocViewer.License.LicenseProvider.SetLicense(System.String)
member.summary: Provides a license by a license file path, which will be used for loading license.

member.name: M:Spire.DocViewer.License.LicenseProvider.SetLicense(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Provides a license by a license stream, which will be used for loading license.

member.name: M:Spire.DocViewer.License.LicenseProvider.SetLicenseKey(System.String)
member.summary: Provides a license by a license key, which will be used for loading license.
member.param: The value of the Key attribute of the element License of you license xml file.

member.name: M:Spire.DocViewer.License.LicenseProvider.SetLicenseKey(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Sets the license key required for license loading, and specifies whether to use a development or test license.
member.param: The value of the Key attribute of the element License of you license xml file.
Indicates whether to apply a development or test license.

member.name: M:Spire.DocViewer.License.LicenseProvider.UnbindDevelopmentOrTestingLicenses
member.summary: Unbind development or testing licenses. Only development or testing licenses can be unbound, deployment licenses cannot be unbound. The approach to lifting development or testing licenses does not allow frequent invocation by the same machine code, mandating a two-hour wait period before it can be invoked again.
member.returns: Returns true if the unbinding operation was successful; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:Spire.DocViewer.License.LicenseProvider.SetLicenseFileName(System.String)
member.summary: Sets the license file name, which will be used for loading license.

member.name: M:Spire.DocViewer.License.LicenseProvider.ClearLicense
member.summary: Clear all cached license.

member.name: M:Spire.DocViewer.License.LicenseProvider.LoadLicense
member.summary: Load the license provided by current setting to the license cache.

member.name: T:Spire.License.Blacklist
member.summary: Authorization Blacklist

member.name: F:Spire.License.Blacklist.BlacklistData
member.summary: The serial number or the MD5 code of the key that is entered into the authorization blacklist.

member.name: M:Spire.License.LicenseProvider.UnbindDevelopmentOrTestingLicenses(System.Type,System.String@)
member.summary: Unbinds development or testing licenses of the specified type. The approach to lifting development or testing licenses does not allow frequent invocation by the same machine code, mandating a two-hour wait period before it can be invoked again.
member.param: The type of the license to unbind.
The error message in case of failure.
member.returns: True if at least one development or test license was unbound, otherwise false.
